title: Accessing the UI via Okta
content:
Enter your email and click ‘Continue’ [Image] You will now be redirected to Auth0. Click ‘Continue with Okta’ [Image] If you are already signed into Okta, you will be logged in instantly. Troubleshooting There are two issues that might prevent this optimal flow from working. If you receive an alert that you cannot access the UI without installing the Okta browser plugin… [Image] …please make sure: You have the Okta browser plugin installed. You are signed into the Okta browser plugin. You are logged into your Chrome profile associated with your Simpli.fi email account. If you receive the message below when entering your email in the UI, try clearing your cache at least 7 days. [Image]

Page Labels: virtual_agent
